level.heading: Schedule II tests.
level.text: The Mayor shall place a substance in Schedule II if the Mayor finds that:
The substance has high potential for abuse;
The substance has currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States or the District of Columbia, or currently accepted medical use, with severe restrictions; and
The abuse of the substance may lead to severe psychological or physical dependence.
